title: Ciboulette et Pain d'Epices
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Bakery, European, French, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Little restaurant in the historical center offering a small menu of soups, salads, quiches and pies--most of it or sometimes all is vegetarian. Simple, home-style cuisine. The owner makes all the food. Open evenings on reservation.
